title: 点进来查看崩溃报告。。
author: 光の旋律
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Why is it breaking :(
Time: 3/14/15 5:05 PM
Description: Exception in server tick loop
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0
 at net.minecraft.world.chunk.NibbleArray.detectAndProcessTrivialArray(NibbleArray.java:33)

这是什么情况,求解

replies.author: 丨龙少丨
replies.txt_content: 很简单！你去后台重启一下服务器即可！

replies.author: 光の旋律
replies.txt_content:
丨龙少丨 发表于 2015-3-14 17:43
很简单！你去后台重启一下服务器即可！
是吗,好吧 = =
不过可能还崩溃

replies.author: 西木凛
replies.txt_content: 你既然不打mod就别用mcpc端吧。

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 换个地图吧，你这个地图加载出问题了

replies.author: 光の旋律
replies.txt_content:

删掉几个插件就好了{:10_495:}
